task.title: Add Exercise Timer Feature
task.description: Create a simple exercise timer component for the PT-Helper app
requirements: SwiftUI timer view with start/stop/reset functionality
Simple data model for timer state
Clean, accessible interface for PT users

context.title: Create Exercise Tracking Module
context.description: Build core exercise tracking functionality for PT-Helper app with SwiftUI interface and data models
requirements: Exercise list view with search and filter capabilities
Individual exercise detail view with instructions
Progress tracking with sets, reps, and completion status

deliverables.description: Main exercise list with search and filtering
Detailed exercise view with instructions and media
ViewModel managing exercise data and user interactions
User exercise session and progress tracking
Service layer for exercise data management

constraints: Follow iOS accessibility guidelines for PT users
Large touch targets for users with limited mobility
Clear visual hierarchy and easy-to-read text
Support for VoiceOver and assistive technologies

model_result.title: add-exercise-timer-feature
model_result.summary: Introduces a new exercise timer feature with a SwiftUI interface, a timer data model, and a view model for business logic.

changes.title: create-exercise-tracking-module
changes.summary: Implements core exercise tracking functionality including views, models, and services for the PT-Helper app.

changes.content:
import Foundation

struct ExerciseSession: Identifiable, Codable {
    var id: UUID
    var exerciseId: UUID
    var startTime: Date
    var endTime: Date?
    var completedSets: Int
    var completedReps: Int
    var notes: String?
    var painLevel: Int?
    var isCompleted: Bool
}
